articles.title: Nord Stream pipeline leak in Baltic Sea could cement Europe's shift to renewables — eventually - CBC News
articles.description: Before the Nord Stream gas pipelines under the Baltic Sea sprung massive leaks this week, spewing out tons of methane into the water and atmosphere, Europe had started planning for a long-term future without Russian gas — prompted by Putin's war in Ukraine.

articles.description: Canada, U.S. and Europe direct more sanctions at Putin’s annexation of Ukraine’s eastern territories as Russian threats escalate.

articles.title: UK government bond tumult ripples into US and European markets - Financial Times
articles.description: Heavy sell-off in gilts described as a case of ‘the tail definitely wagging the dog this week’
articles.content:
Turmoil in UK government debt has sent shockwaves through global markets, sparking big swings in US and European bonds.
